titleStmt.title: A worthy speech made by the Right Honourable the Lord Brooke, at the election of his captaines and commanders at Warwick Castle, as also at the delivery of their last commissions
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Robert Greville, Baron, 1607-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: February the 26. Printed at London for Iohn Vnderwood,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
